item.description:
Nora Delaney will be moderating a session on Philip Larkin's "Mr. Bleaney," "The Whitsun Weddings," and "The Explosion" as part of MIT's Pleasures of Poetry series. Read more about the series at: http://lit.mit.edu/pr...

Location and directions:

The discussion will be held in Room 14E-304 at MIT, which is on the third floor of Building 14 which can be found here: http://whereis.mit.ed.... The best way to enter the building is from memorial drive.

If you take arrive via the red line, get off at Kendall Square and walk down Main Street towards Ames Street. Take a left on Ames Street and walk down until you hit Memorial Drive. Walk down Memorial Drive and enter building 14.

Call Nora at 857-221-2140 if you get stuck.
item.name: MIT Pleasures of Poetry Series
